    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">优化大宽表查询性能，揭秘GaussDB(DWS) 谓词列analyze</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        谓词列通指于 WHERE 条件，join条件，group by中涉及到的列，更广义的是指所有需要用于计划生成需要统计信息列的列。
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">本文分享自华为云社区<a href="https://bbs.huaweicloud.com/blogs/441695?utm_source=cnblog&amp;utm_medium=bbs-ex&amp;utm_campaign=other&amp;utm_content=content" target="_blank" data-type="link" data-id="link429214" rel="noopener nofollow">《GaussDB(DWS) 谓词列analyze揭秘》</a>，作者：SmithCoder。</p>
<h1><span data-name="user">1. 前言</span></h1>
<p><span data-name="user">适用版本：【9.1.0.100（及以上）】</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">​当前GaussDB(DWS)中存在手动analyze，查询触发的动态analyze，以及后台线程的轮询analyze三种触发形式，其中动态analyze又分为light模式和normal模式，light模式是基于内存存储统计信息，normal模式是存储在系统表里，前者较为轻量，对目标表仅加一级锁。这些analyze默认都是对表全列进行采样，尤其对于大宽表analyze，耗时会比较久，其实很多时候计划生成所需的统计信息列只占一部分，如果只对这部分列进行采样计算，将会大大节省analyze的时间。因此GaussDB(DWS)引入了谓词列analyze。</span></p>
<h1><span data-name="user">2.原理介绍</span></h1>
<p><span data-name="user">​analyze的时候主要耗时在采样数据，对于非定长列如varchar，其统计信息的计算也耗时，耗时肯定随着表的列数增加而变长。谓词列analyze会在查询阶段对谓词列进行识别收集，当触发动态analyze，会只选择采样谓词列，手动谓词列analyze也会只采样谓词列部分。</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2030258/202412/2030258-20241225172041263-145989174.png" alt=""></span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">谓词列通指于 WHERE 条件，join条件，group by中涉及到的列，更广义的是指所有需要用于计划生成需要统计信息列的列。</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">识别到的谓词列包含：</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">条件谓词列</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">如比较（=,&gt;,&lt;），like, between,is,in, having，join on,MERGE on后面的列</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">排序分组列</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">如group by， order by, distinct, over partition/order by列，union /minus列</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">子查询引用列</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">等值条件列为一个子查询，子查询的对应的输出列；</span></p>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">cte中的一个列被外层引用为谓词列；</span></p>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">视图中的列被外层应用为谓词列；</span></p>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">agg列</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">索引列</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">列建立了索引，相应的列也会被收集识别</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">分布列</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-indent-1=""><span data-name="user">如果表建立了hash分别列，分布列也收集识别</span></p>
<h1><span data-name="user">3.使用介绍</span></h1>
<p><span data-name="user">下面分别介绍谓词列analyze支持两种形式：</span></p>
<ol>
<li>
<p data-number="1"><span data-name="user">动态采样谓词列analyze</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p data-number="2"><span data-name="user">手动谓词列analyze</span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<h2><span data-name="user">3.1谓词列的guc控制</span></h2>
<p><span data-name="user">谓词列analyze的开启由guc参数<strong>analyze_predicate_column_threshold</strong>控制</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>参数说明</strong>：控制是否开启谓词列ANALYZE及限定支持的最小列数。该参数仅9.1.0.100及以上集群版本支持。</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>参数类型</strong>：SIGHUP</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>取值范围</strong>：整型，0～10000</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">0表示关闭谓词列ANALYZE，不会收集谓词列以及对谓词列进行ANALYZE。</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user">大于0表示开启谓词列收集功能，且仅对列数大于等于此值的表进行谓词列ANALYZE。</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>默认值</strong>：10</span></p>
<h2><span data-name="user">3.2.动态采样谓词列analyze</span></h2>
<p><span data-name="user">前提：动态采样谓词列analyze只支持light模式</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">查询的时候会进行谓词列的识别，如果有新的谓词列或者修改计数达到，则会触发动态采样，会把新识别的和已有的谓词列进行采样计算 统计信息。</span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">下面是按照analyze_predicate_column_threshold=1举例，计划中RunTime Analyze Information部分会打印出analyze的表和列信息。</span></p>
<pre><code>create table t1(a int, b int, c int);
create table t2(a int, b int, c int);
set enable_fast_query_shipping=off;
set autoanalyze_mode=light;
-- 首次会收集所有列的统计信息
test=# explain select * from t1;
                                                            QUERY PLAN                                                            
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  id |          operation           | E-rows | E-memory | E-width | E-costs 
 ----+------------------------------+--------+----------+---------+---------
   1 | -&gt;  Streaming (type: GATHER) |     20 |          |      12 | 16.10   
   2 |    -&gt;  Seq Scan on t1        |     20 | 1MB      |      12 | 10.10   
 
                                                   RunTime Analyze Information                                                   
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
       light runtime analyze on "public.t1" times:9.245ms, stats:sync, change:0(0 in xact), alive:0.000000, threshold:50.000000
 
   ====== Query Summary =====   
 -------------------------------
 System available mem: 4710400KB
 Query Max mem: 4710400KB
 Query estimated mem: 1024KB
 
 insert into t1 select generate_series(1, 100), 1;
 
 -- 修改计数达到，收集到了a,b两个谓词列，触发动态采样
 test=# explain select * from t1 where a=b;
                                                                QUERY PLAN                                                                 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  id |          operation           | E-rows | E-memory | E-width | E-costs 
 ----+------------------------------+--------+----------+---------+---------
   1 | -&gt;  Streaming (type: GATHER) |      1 |          |      12 | 7.62    
   2 |    -&gt;  Seq Scan on t1        |      1 | 1MB      |      12 | 1.62    
 
                                                        RunTime Analyze Information                                                       
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     light runtime analyze on "public.t1(a,b)" times:9.774ms, stats:sync, change:100(0 in xact), alive:100.000000, threshold:50
 
 Predicate Information (identified by plan id)
 ---------------------------------------------
   2 --Seq Scan on t1
         Filter: (a = b)
 
   ====== Query Summary =====   
 -------------------------------
 System available mem: 4710400KB
 Query Max mem: 4710400KB
 Query estimated mem: 1024KB
(19 rows)

-- 修改计数达到后查询，查询下面的语句，会分别收集表t1,t2对应的谓词列
test=# explain select t1.* from t1 join t2 on t1.b=t2.c where t1.a=t2.a;
                                                                 QUERY PLAN                                                     
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  id |              operation               | E-rows | E-memory | E-width | E-costs 
 ----+--------------------------------------+--------+----------+---------+---------
   1 | -&gt;  Streaming (type: GATHER)         |      2 |          |      12 | 21.55   
   2 |    -&gt;  Hash Join (3,5)               |      2 | 1MB      |      12 | 15.55   
   3 |       -&gt;  Streaming(type: BROADCAST) |    400 | 2MB      |       8 | 10.93   
   4 |          -&gt;  Seq Scan on t2          |    200 | 1MB      |       8 | 2.00    
   5 |       -&gt;  Hash                       |    200 | 16MB     |      12 | 2.00    
   6 |          -&gt;  Seq Scan on t1          |    200 | 1MB      |      12 | 2.00    
 
                                                        RunTime Analyze Information                                                        
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     light runtime analyze on "public.t1(a,b)" times:11.031ms, stats:sync, change:100(0 in xact), alive:200.000000, threshold:60
     light runtime analyze on "public.t2(a,c)" times:8.571ms, stats:sync, change:100(0 in xact), alive:200.000000, threshold:60
 
    Predicate Information (identified by plan id)    
 ----------------------------------------------------

         Hash Cond: ((t2.c = t1.b) AND (t2.a = t1.a))

 System available mem: 4710400KB
 Query Max mem: 4710400KB
 Query estimated mem: 4388KB

-- 遇到新的谓词列且该列没有统计信息也会触发
 test=# explain select * from t1 where c=1;
                                                                 QUERY PLAN                                                                 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  id |          operation           | E-rows | E-memory | E-width | E-costs 
 ----+------------------------------+--------+----------+---------+---------
   1 | -&gt;  Streaming (type: GATHER) |      1 |          |      12 | 8.25    
   2 |    -&gt;  Seq Scan on t1        |      1 | 1MB      |      12 | 2.25    
 
                                                        RunTime Analyze Information                                                        
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    light runtime analyze on "public.t1(a,b,c)" times:10.063ms, stats:sync, change:0(0 in xact), alive:200.000000, threshold:70</code></pre>
<h2><span data-name="user">3.3手动谓词列</span></h2>
<p><span data-name="user">语法：<strong>analyze (predicate) tablename;</strong></span></p>
<p><span data-name="user">执行后，只会对当前为止收集到的谓词列进行采样，最后在查询业务稳定后使用；</span></p>
<h2><span data-name="user">3.4谓词列管理</span></h2>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>查询谓词列</strong></span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-name="user">通过函数<strong>pg_stat_get_predicate_columns</strong>可以查询当前表有哪些谓词列</span></p>
<pre><code>test=# select pr.attnum,pa.attname from pg_catalog.pg_stat_get_predicate_columns('t1'::regclass) pr left join pg_attribute pa on pa.attrelid='t1'::regclass and pa.attnum = pr.attnum;
 attnum | attname 
--------+---------
      1 | a
      2 | b
(2 rows)</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-name="user"><strong>清空谓词列</strong></span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-name="user">通过函数select * from pg_catalog.pg_stat_get_predicate_columns(‘t1_3’::regclass);可以清空表的谓词列，一般用于谓词列太多或者过期的情况去清空重建</span></p>
<h1><span data-name="user">4.总结</span></h1>
<p><span data-name="user">9.1.0.100版本中autoanalyze(light模式)和谓词列默认是开启的，用户无需感知。对于频繁大量更新和查询场景，此前的动态采样可能会耗时，影响查询业务，新增谓词列后会减少analyze的耗时，特别对大宽表场景耗时优化是可观的。</span></p>
